data.title: Score Group Expands European Presence and Launches Emissions Elimination Program in Key Downstream Markets with Acquisition of Kampen Valve Care
data.meta_description: Hoogezand, Netherlands – July 2023 – Score Group is pleased to announce its acquisition of Kampen Valve Care B.V, a provider of valve maintenance and repair…
data.text:
Hoogezand, Netherlands – July 2023 – Score Group is pleased to announce its acquisition of Kampen Valve Care B.V, a provider of valve maintenance and repair services to the European downstream and upstream markets for over 45 years. This acquisition will provide Score with a platform to further develop within the Dutch and wider Benelux marketplace and offer the opportunity to Kampen’s existing customers to access Score’s unique value adding services, including its Emissions Elimination Program (EEP).

Scott Will, Score’s Business Unit Director for Europe and Africa, said: “We are delighted to welcome Kampen Valve Care into the Score Group. Kampen has a fantastic reputation in the Netherlands for offering quality valve maintenance services and we are very keen to build and enhance its reputation by introducing our own value adding services and expertise. In particular we see a major opportunity to support our customers in the region to manage and reduce emissions from their operations, both onshore and offshore, by pairing Score’s proprietary emissions detection technology with our unique repair capability.”

Albert De Jonge, Managing Director of Kampen Valve Care, said: “As I reflect on the past 20 years of Kampen Valve Care’s journey, acknowledging the challenges faced, I would like to express my pride in the accomplishments our team has achieved.

“Now being part of the Score Group, it provides us with new opportunities for growth, allowing us to look towards a promising future. Our collaboration with Score over the past 2 years has demonstrated the immense value they bring to our customers, and I am truly excited about this new chapter as part of the Score Group.”

About Score Group
